custom-meta.meta-value: All interview and focus group discussion transcripts are available from the Open ICPSR database. The DOI and information for our data in ICPSR is: Kaawa-Mafigiri, David, and Schmidt-Sane, Megan. Challenges to Ebola preparedness during an ongoing outbreak. Ann Arbor, MI: Inter-university Consortium for Political and Social Research [distributor], 2020-02-21. https://doi.org/10.3886/E117869V1.
